reviewText: Excellent service.  My Grand daughter loves it.  "Granny can we have the Birdie on", as soon as she comes to visit.

My four year old great niece will enjoy these songs like her mother did in 1974.  BUT her mother had to listen to 33 1/3 vinyl LP's
I want to see my niece's face when she hears the songs again after that many years have gone by!

Great DVD. The songs are positive and uplifting. I am trying to teach the lead song "I am a Promise" to my g'daughter. I want her to know how special she is in God's sight. We had this in VHS form for our oldest g'daughter who also loved it.
My own daughter has special needs so this is great to remind her that everyone is special! I highly recommend the Homecoming kids for kids of all ages!
Came quickly...quality! A+ all the way around - very happy with purchase. The songs are Gaither classics for children. My children loved it and watch it repeatedly - worth every penny!
